Handler API¶

Defines a class for the server handler that uses SimpleHTTPRequestHandler.

class handler.CIServerHandler(update_commit_status_fn, make_log_title_fn, make_log_fn, *args)¶

Custom HTTP handler that handles requests from the Github webhook.

__init__(update_commit_status_fn, make_log_title_fn, make_log_fn, *args)¶

Initiates functions from CIserver.

Parameters

  • update_commit_status_fn – function for updating the commit status.

  • make_log_title_fn – function for generating a title for a build log.

  • make_log_fn – function for creating a build log.

clone_branch(data)¶

Clones the branch related to the push event.

Parameters

data – POST data.

Returns

zero if success.

do_GET()¶

Handles GET requests.

do_POST()¶

Handles POST requests.

push_handler(data)¶

Handles push events in the git repo.

Parameters

data – POST data.

Returns

True if an error is encountered. False otherwise.

remove_cloned_branch(commit_id)¶

Removes the cloned branch of a given commit.

Parameters

commit_id – identifier of commit.

Returns

zero if success.

run_lint(path)¶

Runs lint on the cloned code using a shellscript.

Parameters

path – path to the shellscript.

Returns

string with the lint results.

run_tests(commit_id)¶

Runs the tests of the cloned code.

Parameters

commit_id – id of a commit used to identify the location of the cloned repo.

Returns

string with the test results.

send_custom_response(code, msg)¶

Sends a custom response.

Parameters

  • code – HTTP code.

  • msg – message in the response.

verify_signature(post_data)¶

Verifies the signature of the webhook.

Parameters

post_data – used to sign the message.

Returns

True if wrong signature. False otherwise.
